live_updates: This issue is now resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
31552.summary: Some customers in surrounding areas of Lago Lindo of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31552.title: Jan 7 - Edmonton | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
